name: soft-serve
description: Soft Serve is a self-hosted, TUI-first Git server and code forge. It exposes repositories via SSH with a retro terminal UI, and optionally serves a minimal web view.

features.title: Git Server
features.description: Hosts Git repositories with SSH access

features.title: Tui Interface
features.description: Browses repositories and code through terminal user interface

features.title: Ssh Authentication
features.description: Authenticates users via SSH keys for secure access

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Displays README files with formatted markdown in terminal

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Optionally serves minimal web view for repository browsing

features.title: User Management
features.description: Controls repository access with user permissions
